titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit foreign travel by a retiring Member.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 2/1/1996--Introduced. Amends the Rules of the House of Representatives to add rule LIII to prohibit a retiring Member of the House or such Member's personal staff from engaging in official travel outside the United States unless the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct determines that such travel is essential to the Member's official responsibilities.
